comments:
Description:
XTab sort and filter on cube dimension attribute issue.
Build number:2.2.0.v20070621

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a cube with attribute in dimension.
2. Insert a xtab and add sort on attribute or filter on attribute

Expected result:
This feature will be supported in 2.2.1, so suggest to disable this action in designer.

Actual result:
Add sort on attribute will throw DataException to say that the level name is not found, actually is the attribute name here. Then xtab fail to display data.
Add filter on atribute will display xtab with no data.

Error log:
ReportDesign (id = 1): 
- The level name "dimension["Group1"]["CUSTOMERNAME"]["COUNTRY"]" is not found. 
The level name "dimension["Group1"]["CUSTOMERNAME"]["COUNTRY"]" is not found. ( 1 time(s) )
